title: SU(3)X SU(2)XU(1) Chiral Models from Intersecting D4-/D5-branes
abstract: We clarify RR tadpole cancellation conditions for intersecting D4-/D5-branes. We find all of the D4-brane models which have D=4 three-generation chiral fermions with the SU(3)XSU(2)XU(1)^n symmetries. For the D5-brane case, we present a solution to the conditions which gives exactly the matter contents of standard model with U(1) anomalies.
